title: Graph of deriv: segments and semicircle part - b

content.question: Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of y=g(x) on the interval -7<x<5. Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: Find the x-coordinate of each point of inflection of the graph of y=g(x) on the interval -7<x<5. Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
